mapper.select: SELECT CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS RES FROM BN_DIRECTORY WHERE NO = 1
SELECT NO , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , ENABLED , UID , PUBLIC_ACCESSIBLE , PARENT_NO , OWNER_NO , HAS_CHILD , CREATION , LAST_MODIFIED , NAME , ABSOLUTE_PATH FROM BN_DIRECTORY WHERE NO = #{dirNo}
SELECT NO , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , ENABLED , UID , PARENT_NO , OWNER_NO , FILE_LENGTH , FILE_TYPE , CREATION , LAST_MODIFIED , EXTENSION , NAME FROM BN_FILE WHERE NO = #{fileNo}
SELECT CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS RES FROM ${tableName} WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}

SELECT FILE_NO , UPDATE_DATE , TITLE , SUBJECT , CREATOR , LAST_MODIFIED_BY , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , KEYWORDS , DESCRIPTION , HEADING_PAIRS , COMPANY FROM BN_FILE_DOCUMENT WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE BN_FILE_DOCUMENT SET UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , TITLE = #{title} NULL , SUBJECT = #{subject} NULL , CREATOR = #{creator} NULL , LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy} NULL , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} NULL , MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate} NULL , KEYWORDS = #{keywords} NULL , DESCRIPTION = #{description} NULL , HEADING_PAIRS = #{headingPairs} NULL , COMPANY = #{company} NULL WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO , UPDATE_DATE , MAKE , CAMERA_MODEL_NAME , ORIENTATION , F_NUMBER , EXPOSURE_TIME , SENSING_METHOD , FLASH , LIGHT_SOURCE , WHITE_BALANCE , SHUTTER_SPEED , ISO , IMAGE_WIDTH , IMAGE_HEIGHT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , GPS_LATITUDE , GPS_LONGITUDE FROM BN_FILE_IMAGE WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}

SELECT FILE_NO , UPDATE_DATE , MIME_TYPE , AUTHOR , DURATION , PREFERRED_RATE , PREFERRED_VOLUME , AUDIO_FORMAT , AUDIO_BITS_PER_SAMPLE , AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE , LAYOUT_FLAGS , AUDIO_CHANNELS , COMPRESSOR_VERSION , CAMERA_MODEL_NAME , FIRMWARE_VERSION , AVG_BITRATE , ROTATION , IMAGE_WIDTH , IMAGE_HEIGHT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , GPS_LATITUDE , GPS_LONGITUDE FROM BN_FILE_VIDEO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}

SELECT FILE_NO , UPDATE_DATE , MIME_TYPE , SAMPLE_RATE , CHANNELS , BITS_PER_SAMPLE , TOTAL_SAMPLES , TITLE , ARTIST , ALBUM , GENRE , ALBUM_ARTIST , DISCNUMBER , ALBUM_DATE , ORGANIZATION , TRACK_NUMBER , DURATION FROM BN_FILE_AUDIO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
SELECT FILE_NO , UPDATE_DATE , ARCHIVE_FORMAT , TOTAL_ENTRIES , UNCOMPRESSED_SIZE , COMPRESSION_RATIO , ENCRYPTED , PASSWORD_PROTECTED , COMMENT FROM BN_FILE_ARCHIVE WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
SELECT THUMBNAIL AS BIN_DATA FROM BN_FILE_THUMBNAIL THM INNER JOIN BN_FILE F ON THM.FILE_NO = F.NO WHERE F.UID = #{fid}
